name: VeeR VR
detailed_description:
VeeR is a Virtual Reality app featuring a global VR video content network, providing video contents handpicked from a dynamic community of creators globalwide. VeeR brings you true cross-platform experience from mobile (Android, iOS) to Gear VR and Web (veer dot tv).

EXPLORE ORIGINAL VR VIDEOS GLOBALLY
VeeR is built for global VR video lovers. From game videos to rollercoaster experience, from skydiving to horror. VeeR is all you need to experience the world in VR.

INTERACT WITH VIDEO CREATORS
VeeR puts you in front of a global community of creators. From talented Thai anime MMD maker to professional European journalist. You can comment, like and share their work and interact with them on VeeR.


Any thoughts or feedback? Leave us a message on Facebook and Twitter, we will be in touch!

Facebook: @letsveer
Twitter: @letsveer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9800/NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti/NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD 4870/AMD RADEON RX 480/AMD RADEON R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
